body.name: Revlon Makeup Sharpener for Eyeliner, Lip Liner, and More! Universal Sharpener for All Wooden & Plastic Pencil Sizes
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: QUICK AND EASY SHARPENER: Get sharp and precise tips with the must-have beauty tool that sharpens almost all types of cosmetic pencils
SHARPENS WOODEN AND PLASTIC PENCILS: Sharpen both wooden and plastic cosmetic pencils, from eyeliner to lip liner and eyebrow pencils
WORKS ON 3 PENCIL SIZES: This pencil sharpener works on 3 different pencil sizes, small, medium and large. Just pull out the special adaptor ring to sharpen larger sizes
DURABLE SHARPENING TOOL: A reliable, essential makeup pencil sharpener that won’t break pencils during sharpening. Perfect for every makeup kit

MESS FREE & EASY TO CLEAN: It’s so easy to clean and empty. Lift the top to empty the shavings, and then use the safety pick in the design to clean the blades. The cap will stay on in your bag so you don’t have to worry about spilled shavings
body.description: Product Description Get to the point with our Universal Points Sharpener, the must-have beauty tool that quickly sharpens almost both wooden and plastic cosmetic pencils. Works for 3 different sizes of pencils—just pull out the special adaptor ring to sharpen larger sizes. REVLON is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. REVLON revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup. Brand Story By Revlon

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revlon Universal Points Sharpener This cosmetic pencil sharpener doesn't mess around: You get a precise point, quickly and easilySharpens both wooden and plastic cosmetic pencilsWorks for 3 different sizes of pencils—just pull out the special adaptor ring to sharpen larger sizesKeep your cosmetic pencil sharpener in tip-top shape by occasionally lifting the top to empty the shavings, then using the safety pick in the design to clean the blades

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and Steady
reviews.reviewText: I've had this lip pencil sharpener for a good 3 years, and surprise, surprise—it's still sharp!Positives:This little guy is like the superhero of sharpeners. It comes with two sizes, so it's like the Swiss Army knife for all my lip, eye, and brow pencils. Sharpens them up without any break-up drama, even the softer ones. Plus, it's pint-sized, making it the perfect travel buddy. And, oh, it's got a secret compartment for pencil scraps—no messy cleanups after every use.Negatives:Just a heads-up, don't go wild on the sharpening. The cap holding the pencil bits isn't the most reliable. Overstuff it, and it might just decide to fling pencil confetti all over your makeup bag.Overall:This sharpener is like a low-key hero in my makeup stash. Does the job, no fuss, and still kicking after 3 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has to be the best sharpener I've had for eyeliner in years.Honestly, all the others I've had never got it to look that sharp and clean before.Recommended for plastic and pencil eyeliners and does great with both!! 👍 👍👍👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for plastic eyeliners…
reviews.reviewText: I have an eyeliner that doesn’t have wood around the pencil. This is sharp enough to cut the plastic coating smoothly. My last one just ate too much pencil and left rough edges. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great choice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend, I've noticed that it works great most of the time, but If your lip liner is too short and dull it has a hard time sharpening it, this tool works best when it's used for touch ups on the edge of your makeupOverall: I would buy again especially for the price it stands at

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sharpener does not skip while turning the pencil. Great sharpener

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfect on gel eyeliners!
reviews.reviewText: So happy I found this. My old sharpener left my gel eyeliner with sharp edges and this one sharpens them to exactly how it was when brand new!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars made my life so much easier!
reviews.reviewText: this sharpener works so well, and I love that it accommodates for jumbo pencils too! It always gives me an amazing point, and is easy to clean. definitely recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It always deliver!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this Eyeliner Sharpener for years, and after I discovered I'm not looking for any other brand!! Delivers every single time and if you take care of it, it will last you indefinitely!! I love things that can last me a long time, because I feel that it was a good investment and value for my money!!

This is my 2nd Revlon sharpener and it works just as well as the first one I bought about 10 years ago. That original one is still working but I thought I should get a new one after 10 years. Sharpens eyeliner pencils smoothly and evenly. That is all I ask of it and it delivers every time!
Ótimo produto. Plástico bem resistente. A lâmina do apontador é muito boa. Tem dois tamanhos para lápis.
El saca puntas es muy útil ya que trae un adaptador con el cual se puede sacar punta a tres diferentes tamaños de lápices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is expensive but the best makeup pencil sharpener I have had. Finally one that does large pencils if you take the adapter fitting out from the largest side.

This is literally the best makeup/eyeliner sharpener I have ever had, and I have been a longtime (pencil and the gel pencils) eyeliner wearer, so I have had many sharpeners. This Revlon sharpener is the only one that manages to sharpen my Covergirl Kohl gel pencil eyeliner without tearing it up! And at this price point, I was not expecting such high precision. I will change my rating if it breaks or gets jammed with gunk or stops working, but for now I can confidently say it’s a great sharpener.
